name: degreasing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of removing grease (= oil or soft fat) from a surface or object: PCE is a chemical used in dry cleaning and metal degreasing. Degreasing agents such as soap will give cast iron a dull surface.
More examplesFewer examplesThe following solvents used in degreasing are hazardous.Industrial processes carried out at the depot include painting, degreasing, sand blasting and steam cleaning.Preparation of metal before painting consists of cleaning and degreasing.The soil was tainted with degreasing solvents.
